name: Council for Green Revolution

address: 1448, Street No.17, Banjara Green Colony, Road No.12, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad-500034, AP

briefDescription: Council for Green Revolution(CGR), an Environmental action based group at Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh is a registered Public Charitable Society formed with concern and commitment towards protection of environment and promotion of sustainable development. CGR has mainly involved activities like (i) Conducting awareness programs to sensitize (ii) Regeneration of Green Cover through plantation programs and (iii) Restoration of damaged ecosystems and sustainable Development. CGR has successfully planted around 18, 43,883 saplings so far as a part of “Massive Tree Plantation Programme” by involving 3, 23,989 Students of 1040 Government schools of AP through various programs with a follow up activity for a time frame of one year where two students from each school are given a Certificate and a Medal on behalf of our organization, who have excelled in safeguarding the given saplings. We also motivate the students to celebrate “Birthday” of the sapling after one year.
